hero.title: Buy & Sell Locally, Connect Directly
hero.subtitle: Shop Smart, Shop Easy
hero.description: Join our community shop where anyone can list items for sale and buyers connect directly with sellers. Simple, safe, and social.

features.title: Why Choose Our Marketplace?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to buy and sell with confidence

listItems.title: Easy Listing
listItems.description: Upload your items for sale in minutes with our simple form. Add photos, description, and price.

community.title: Active Community
community.description: Join a vibrant community of buyers and sellers. Build trust and reputation over time.

directContact.title: Direct Messaging
directContact.description: Contact sellers directly to ask questions, negotiate, and arrange payment and delivery.

payment.title: Flexible Payments
payment.description: Pay online securely with Stripe credit card processing, or choose cash payment on delivery.

cashOption.title: Cash Accepted
cashOption.description: Prefer cash? No problem! Arrange cash payment directly with the seller when you meet.

secure.title: Secure Platform
secure.description: Your data and online payments are protected with industry-standard encryption and security measures.

twoFactorAuth.title: Account Security
twoFactorAuth.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account with two-factor authentication.

products.title: Wide Selection
products.description: Browse thousands of quality products across multiple categories. Find exactly what you're looking for.

cart.title: Smart Cart
cart.description: Easy cart management with saved items, quick checkout, and order tracking features.

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Quick and reliable shipping options. Track your orders in real-time from warehouse to doorstep.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our customer support team is always ready to help you with any questions or concerns.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started is simple - join, list, connect, and transact

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up for free to join our community marketplace. Set up your secure profile in minutes.

step2.title: List Your Items
step2.description: Upload items you want to sell with photos, description, and price. It's quick and easy!

step3.title: Browse & Discover
step3.description: Search through listings from community members. Find exactly what you're looking for.

step4.title: Connect & Buy
step4.description: Message sellers, arrange payment (Stripe or cash), and coordinate delivery on your terms.

productsShowcase.subtitle: Browse items listed by our community members
